description:
Dark Quest: Remastered is a turn-based fantasy dungeon crawler inspired by classic board games and tabletop adventures.

A dark sorcerer has built a dungeon beneath the village of Darkwood, unleashing his minions upon the land. Lead a party of heroes into dangerous dungeons, plan your moves carefully on a grid-based battlefield, and defeat the forces of evil threatening the realm.

Perfect for short or long play sessions, Dark Quest: Remastered delivers strategic combat, charming fantasy style, and timeless gameplay—now fully remastered for modern consoles.

Features:
- Turn-based, grid-based combat
- Party-based dungeon exploration
- Classic fantasy adventure
- Remastered visuals and improvements
- Optimized for handheld and docked play
